training_sessions.issue_identified: Paragraph spacing not displaying in training interface
training_sessions.root_cause: Text extraction function was removing empty lines that represent paragraph breaks during line filtering

solution_implemented.description: Modified line filtering to preserve empty lines for paragraph breaks
solution_implemented.specific_change: Changed filter logic to keep empty lines (trimmed.length === 0) return true

html_pattern_learned.preservation_requirement: Maintain empty lines during text filtering to preserve paragraph structure

training_sessions.training_outcome: SUCCESSFUL - AI correctly identified and fixed paragraph spacing issue

training_sessions.issue_identified: Frontend JavaScript errors preventing content display from prnewswire.com URL
training_sessions.root_cause: Multiple JavaScript issues: 1) undefined analyzeText() function calls, 2) incorrect element ID references, 3) broken auto-advance functionality

solution_implemented.description: Fixed JavaScript function references and element IDs in training interface
specific_changes: Changed all analyzeText() calls to analyzeCurrentText()

training_sessions.training_outcome: SUCCESSFUL - AI identified and fixed frontend JavaScript issues preventing content display
training_sessions.next_action: Interface ready for prnewswire.com URL and other press release sources
